alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 1:09PM PST until March 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. Localized gusts in favored canyon areas up to 50 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
